member.name: T:cmSi.partVoucher
member.summary: inherits base voucher type. If cart item is in buyPart list, apply discount.

member.name: M:cmSi.pcSpendVoucher.#ctor(System.Xml.XmlNode)
member.summary: Inherits spendVoucher type. Instantiates base voucher with percentage discount (overrides discount property) on entire order, with optional minimum spend.

member.name: F:cmSi.spendVoucher._spend
member.summary: Inherits Voucher type. Instantiates voucher with discount on entire order, with optional minimum spend.

member.name: F:cmSi.Voucher._des
member.remarks: inherit voucher implementations from here. Apply must be overidden
